author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for ordinances (or related documents) that require new subdivisions to install energy efficient lighting.  As well, documentation, reports, etc. that identify your agency’s savings from installing LED, Solar, etc., lighting, traffic signals and the like.
We appreciate your support and expertise.
Pam Muse
Alliance For Innovation
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Require Energy Efficient Lighting - new subdivisions
